info.title: Hadley API
info.description: Local API proxy for Peter's real-time queries

get.description: Search emails with pagination support for large result sets.

schema.description: Max results (up to 500 for seed imports)

Create a calendar event with full options. Rate limited to 20/minute.

Colors: 1=lavender, 2=sage, 3=grape, 4=flamingo, 5=banana, 6=tangerine,
        7=peacock, 8=graphite, 9=blueberry, 10=basil, 11=tomato

schema.description: Start datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM or YYYY-MM-DD for all-day)
schema.title: Start

parameters.description: Start datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM or YYYY-MM-DD for all-day)

parameters.name: end

schema.description: End datetime (optional, defaults to 1 hour after start)
schema.title: End

parameters.description: End datetime (optional, defaults to 1 hour after start)

Get vehicle status directly from Kia Connect API.

This provides actual battery SOC, range, charging status, etc.
from the car itself (not extrapolated by Ohme).

Kia provides: actual battery %, range, charging status
Ohme provides: charge rate, energy added, smart charge scheduling

get.description:
Fetch and extract text from a URL (PDF, HTML, or plain text).

Runs on Windows to avoid WSL DNS/network issues.
Supports:
- PDF files: Extracts text using pypdf
- HTML pages: Extracts text using readability
- Plain text: Returns as-is

post.description:
Create a new inventory item in Hadley Bricks.

Required fields:
- set_number: LEGO set number (e.g., "75192")

Optional fields:
- item_name: Item name (auto-populated from set number if blank)
- condition: "New" or "Used" (default: New)
- status: BACKLOG, LISTED, SOLD, NOT YET RECEIVED (default: BACKLOG)
- source: Purchase source
- purchase_date: Date acquired (YYYY-MM-DD)
- cost: Cost paid
- purchase_id: UUID of linked purchase record
- storage_location: Storage code
- notes: Additional notes

get.description: Get daily listings and sales activity.

parameters.name: preset

schema.description: Preset: today, yesterday, this_week, this_month, last_month
schema.title: Preset

parameters.description: Preset: today, yesterday, this_week, this_month, last_month

parameters.name: source

schema.description: Filter by source (eBay, Vinted, Facebook Marketplace, etc.)
schema.title: Source

parameters.description: Filter by source (eBay, Vinted, Facebook Marketplace, etc.)

post.description:
Create a new purchase record in Hadley Bricks.

Required fields:
- purchase_date: Date of purchase (YYYY-MM-DD)
- short_description: Brief description (e.g., "LEGO 75192 from Vinted")
- cost: Total cost paid (positive number)

Optional fields:
- source: Where purchased (Vinted, FB Marketplace, etc.)
- payment_method: How paid (PayPal, Cash, etc.)
- description: Detailed notes
- reference: Order/reference number

get.description: Get ROI analysis by purchase source.
Look up LEGO set information and pricing.
Check current stock for a specific set.
Get picking list for unfulfilled orders.

Look up set info and Amazon ASIN for a LEGO set.

Returns set details from Brickset/catalog including ASIN if available.

Get market pricing for a LEGO set.

Returns eBay and BrickLink pricing data.

post.description:
Create purchase + inventory records in one operation.

This is the same endpoint used by the automated email scanner.
Creates 1:1 purchase-to-inventory mapping with full enrichment.

For manual imports without email_id, generate a unique reference
like "manual-{timestamp}" to prevent deduplication issues.

Send a WhatsApp message via Twilio sandbox.

Supports text messages and media (images, PDFs, etc.).
Media URL must be publicly accessible for Twilio to fetch.

Note: Twilio sandbox requires recipient to have joined first.
Send "join <phrase>" to +1 415 523 8886 to activate.

parameters.name: media_url

schema.description: URL of image/file to attach (must be publicly accessible)
schema.title: Media Url

parameters.description: URL of image/file to attach (must be publicly accessible)

get.description:
List pending reminders, optionally filtered by user.

Args:
    user_id: If provided, only return reminders for this user

Returns:
    List of pending reminder objects sorted by run_at

post.description:
Create a new reminder.

Args:
    reminder: ReminderCreate with task, run_at, user_id, channel_id

Returns:
    Created reminder object with id

patch.description:
Update an existing reminder.

Args:
    reminder_id: The reminder ID to update
    update: ReminderUpdate with optional task and/or run_at

Returns:
    Updated reminder object

delete.description:
Delete/cancel a reminder.

Args:
    reminder_id: The reminder ID to delete

Returns:
    Confirmation of deletion

get.description: Debug endpoint to check Second Brain database schema.

Search the Second Brain knowledge base using semantic search.

This searches across all saved knowledge: articles, notes, ideas,
and passively captured content from conversations.

Args:
    query: Natural language search query
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 5, max 20)
    min_similarity: Minimum similarity threshold (default 0.75)

Returns:
    List of matching knowledge items with excerpts and similarity scores
Get task counts per list type (excludes done/cancelled).

post.description: Create a new task.

get.description: Get all tasks for a specific list type.
Get a single task by ID.

post.description: Change task status with validation.
Schedule a task for heartbeat.

get.description: Get heartbeat plan showing scheduled tasks by date.

post.description: Add a comment to a task.
Reorder a task within its column.
Bulk reorder tasks. Expects list of {id: str, sort_order: int}.

get.description:
List all allowed domains for browser automation.

Returns the domain allowlist with configuration details.

Get current spending limits and usage.

Returns configured limits and how much has been spent today/this week.

post.description:
Check if a purchase amount is within spending limits.

Use this before proceeding with a purchase to verify it won't exceed limits.

Start a new browser session for an allowed domain.

The session will use stored authentication if available.
Only one session can be active at a time.

get.description: Get information about an active session.

post.description:
End a browser session.

Optionally saves session state (cookies) for future use.

get.description:
Take a screenshot of the current page.

Returns base64-encoded PNG image.

Get visible text content from the current page.

Useful for understanding page state without screenshots.

Fetch a page using a real browser (bypasses bot protection).

This is a convenience endpoint that:
1. Launches a headless browser
2. Navigates to the URL
3. Waits for content to load
4. Extracts visible text
5. Closes the browser

Use this for sites that block normal HTTP requests (e.g., Cloudflare, bot detection).
Any URL is allowed (read-only, no purchases possible).
